sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const getTime = (timeStamp) => { return `${new Date(timeStamp * 1000).getHours()} : ${new Date( timeStamp * 1000 ).getMinutes()}`; }; const EventPlannerWeather = (props) => { console.log('EventPlannerWeather props:', props); return (

Weather Suitability for Event Planning

Temperature: {Math.round(props.weatherData.temp)}°C

Humidity: {props.weatherData.humidity}%

Rain: {props.weather.description}

Wind Speed: {props.windData.speed} mph

Overall: {props.weather.description === 'light rain' ? 'Consider indoor options' : 'Suitable for outdoor events'}

{Math.round(props.weatherData.temp)}°C

{props.weather.description}

{props.lang?'Wind: ':'हवा: '}{props.windData.speed} mph

{props.lang?'Min Temp: ':'न्यूनतम ताप: '}{Math.round(props.weatherData.temp_min)}°C

{props.lang?'Max Temp: ':'अधिकतम ताप: '}{Math.round(props.weatherData.temp_max)}°C

{props.lang?'SUNRISE':'सूर्योदय'}

{getTime(props.city.sunrise)}

{props.lang?'HUMIDITY':'नमी'}

{props.weatherData.humidity} mm

{props.lang?'WIND':'हवा'}

{props.windData.speed} mph

{props.lang?'PRESURE':'दबाव'}

{props.weatherData.pressure} mb

{props.lang?'SUNSET':'सूर्यास्त'}

{getTime(props.city.sunset)}

); }; export default EventPlannerWeather;
